speaker: ARIEL

speaker: PROSPERO
line: O, was she so? I must

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Once in a month recount what thou hast been,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Which thou forget'st. This damn'd witch Sycorax,

speaker: PROSPERO
line: For mischiefs manifold and sorceries terrible

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To enter human hearing, from Argier,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou know'st, was banish'd: for one thing she did

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.

line: They would not take her life. Is not this true?

line: Ay, sir.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: This blue-eyed hag was hither brought with child

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And here was left by the sailors. Thou, my slave,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: As thou report'st thyself, wast then her servant;

speaker: PROSPERO
line: And, for thou wast a spirit too delicate

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To act her earthy and abhorr'd commands,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Refusing her grand hests, she did confine thee,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: By help of her more potent ministers

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And in her most unmitigable rage,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Into a cloven pine; within which rift

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Imprison'd thou didst painfully remain

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: A dozen years; within which space she died

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And left thee there; where thou didst vent thy groans

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: As fast as mill-wheels strike. Then was this island--

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Save for the son that she did litter here,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: A freckled whelp hag-born--not honour'd with

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: A human shape.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: Yes, Caliban her son.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Dull thing, I say so; he, that Caliban

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Whom now I keep in service. Thou best know'st

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: What torment I did find thee in; thy groans

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Did make wolves howl and penetrate the breasts

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Of ever angry bears: it was a torment

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To lay upon the damn'd, which Sycorax

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Could not again undo: it was mine art,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: When I arrived and heard thee, that made gape

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The pine and let thee out.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: I thank thee, master.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: If thou more murmur'st, I will rend an oak

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And peg thee in his knotty entrails till

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou hast howl'd away twelve winters.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: Pardon, master;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: I will be correspondent to command

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: And do my spiriting gently.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Do so, and after two days

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: I will discharge thee.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: That's my noble master!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: What shall I do? say what; what shall I do?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Go make thyself like a nymph o' the sea: be subject

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To no sight but thine and mine, invisible

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To every eyeball else. Go take this shape

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And hither come in't: go, hence with diligence!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Awake, dear heart, awake! thou hast slept well; Awake!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: The strangeness of your story put

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Heaviness in me.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Shake it off. Come on;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: We'll visit Caliban my slave, who never

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Yields us kind answer.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: 'Tis a villain, sir,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: I do not love to look on.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: But, as 'tis,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: We cannot miss him: he does make our fire,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Fetch in our wood and serves in offices

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: That profit us. What, ho! slave! Caliban!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou earth, thou! speak.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Within  There's wood enough within.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Come forth, I say! there's other business for thee:

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Come, thou tortoise! when?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Fine apparition! My quaint Ariel,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Hark in thine ear.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: My lord it shall be done.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou poisonous slave, got by the devil himself

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Upon thy wicked dam, come forth!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: As wicked dew as e'er my mother brush'd

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: With raven's feather from unwholesome fen

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Drop on you both! a south-west blow on ye

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: And blister you all o'er!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: For this, be sure, to-night thou shalt have cramps,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Side-stitches that shall pen thy breath up; urchins

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Shall, for that vast of night that they may work,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: All exercise on thee; thou shalt be pinch'd

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: As thick as honeycomb, each pinch more stinging

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Than bees that made 'em.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: I must eat my dinner.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: This island's mine, by Sycorax my mother,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Which thou takest from me. When thou camest first,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Thou strokedst me and madest much of me, wouldst give me

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Water with berries in't, and teach me how

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: To name the bigger light, and how the less,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: That burn by day and night: and then I loved thee

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: And show'd thee all the qualities o' the isle,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: The fresh springs, brine-pits, barren place and fertile:

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Cursed be I that did so! All the charms

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Of Sycorax, toads, beetles, bats, light on you!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: For I am all the subjects that you have,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Which first was mine own king: and here you sty me

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: In this hard rock, whiles you do keep from me

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: The rest o' the island.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou most lying slave,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Whom stripes may move, not kindness! I have used thee,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Filth as thou art, with human care, and lodged thee

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: In mine own cell, till thou didst seek to violate

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The honour of my child.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: O ho, O ho! would't had been done!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Thou didst prevent me; I had peopled else

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: This isle with Calibans.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Abhorred slave,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Which any print of goodness wilt not take,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Being capable of all ill! I pitied thee,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Took pains to make thee speak, taught thee each hour

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: One thing or other: when thou didst not, savage,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Know thine own meaning, but wouldst gabble like

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: A thing most brutish, I endow'd thy purposes

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: With words that made them known. But thy vile race,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Though thou didst learn, had that in't which

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: good natures

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Could not abide to be with; therefore wast thou

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Deservedly confined into this rock,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Who hadst deserved more than a prison.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: You taught me language; and my profit on't

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Is, I know how to curse. The red plague rid you

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: For learning me your language!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Hag-seed, hence!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Fetch us in fuel; and be quick, thou'rt best,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To answer other business. Shrug'st thou, malice?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: If thou neglect'st or dost unwillingly

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: What I command, I'll rack thee with old cramps,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Fill all thy bones with aches, make thee roar

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: That beasts shall tremble at thy din.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: No, pray thee.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: I must obey: his art is of such power,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: It would control my dam's god, Setebos,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: and make a vassal of him.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: So, slave; hence!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Come unto these yellow sands,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And then take hands:

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Courtsied when you have and kiss'd

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The wild waves whist,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Foot it featly here and there;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And, sweet sprites, the burthen bear.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Hark, hark!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Burthen (dispersedly, within) Bow-wow

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The watch-dogs bark!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Hark, hark! I hear

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The strain of strutting chanticleer

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Cry, Cock-a-diddle-dow.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Where should this music be? i' the air or the earth?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: It sounds no more: and sure, it waits upon

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Some god o' the island. Sitting on a bank,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Weeping again the king my father's wreck,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: This music crept by me upon the waters,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Allaying both their fury and my passion

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: With its sweet air: thence I have follow'd it,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Or it hath drawn me rather. But 'tis gone.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: No, it begins again.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Full fathom five thy father lies;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Of his bones are coral made;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Those are pearls that were his eyes:

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Nothing of him that doth fade

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: But doth suffer a sea-change

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Into something rich and strange.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Sea-nymphs hourly ring his knell

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Hark! now I hear them,--Ding-dong, bell.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: The ditty does remember my drown'd father.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: This is no mortal business, nor no sound

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: That the earth owes. I hear it now above me.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The fringed curtains of thine eye advance

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And say what thou seest yond.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: What is't? a spirit?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Lord, how it looks about! Believe me, sir,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: It carries a brave form. But 'tis a spirit.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: No, wench; it eats and sleeps and hath such senses

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: As we have, such. This gallant which thou seest

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Was in the wreck; and, but he's something stain'd

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: With grief that's beauty's canker, thou mightst call him

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: A goodly person: he hath lost his fellows

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And strays about to find 'em.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: I might call him

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: A thing divine, for nothing natural

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: I ever saw so noble.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Aside It goes on, I see,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: As my soul prompts it. Spirit, fine spirit! I'll free thee

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Within two days for this.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Most sure, the goddess

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: On whom these airs attend! Vouchsafe my prayer

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: May know if you remain upon this island;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: And that you will some good instruction give

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: How I may bear me here: my prime request,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Which I do last pronounce, is, O you wonder!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: If you be maid or no?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: No wonder, sir;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: But certainly a maid.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: My language! heavens!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: I am the best of them that speak this speech,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Were I but where 'tis spoken.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: How? the best?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: What wert thou, if the King of Naples heard thee?

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: A single thing, as I am now, that wonders

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: To hear thee speak of Naples. He does hear me;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: And that he does I weep: myself am Naples,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Who with mine eyes, never since at ebb, beheld

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: The king my father wreck'd.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Alack, for mercy!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Yes, faith, and all his lords; the Duke of Milan

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: And his brave son being twain.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Aside The Duke of Milan

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And his more braver daughter could control thee,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: If now 'twere fit to do't. At the first sight

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: They have changed eyes. Delicate Ariel,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: I'll set thee free for this.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: A word, good sir;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: I fear you have done yourself some wrong: a word.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Why speaks my father so ungently? This

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Is the third man that e'er I saw, the first

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: That e'er I sigh'd for: pity move my father

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: To be inclined my way!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: O, if a virgin,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: And your affection not gone forth, I'll make you

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: The queen of Naples.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Soft, sir! one word more.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: They are both in either's powers; but this swift business

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: I must uneasy make, lest too light winning

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Make the prize light.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: One word more; I charge thee

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: That thou attend me: thou dost here usurp

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The name thou owest not; and hast put thyself

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Upon this island as a spy, to win it

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: From me, the lord on't.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: No, as I am a man.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: There's nothing ill can dwell in such a temple:

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: If the ill spirit have so fair a house,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Good things will strive to dwell with't.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Follow me.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Speak not you for him; he's a traitor. Come;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: I'll manacle thy neck and feet together:

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Sea-water shalt thou drink; thy food shall be

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: The fresh-brook muscles, wither'd roots and husks

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Wherein the acorn cradled. Follow.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: No;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: I will resist such entertainment till

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Mine enemy has more power.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: O dear father,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Make not too rash a trial of him, for

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: He's gentle and not fearful.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: What? I say,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: My foot my tutor? Put thy sword up, traitor;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Who makest a show but darest not strike, thy conscience

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Is so possess'd with guilt: come from thy ward,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: For I can here disarm thee with this stick

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And make thy weapon drop.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Beseech you, father.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Hence! hang not on my garments.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Sir, have pity;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: I'll be his surety.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Silence! one word more

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Shall make me chide thee, if not hate thee. What!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: An advocate for an imposter! hush!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou think'st there is no more such shapes as he,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Having seen but him and Caliban: foolish wench!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To the most of men this is a Caliban

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And they to him are angels.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: My affections

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Are then most humble; I have no ambition

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: To see a goodlier man.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Come on; obey:

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thy nerves are in their infancy again

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And have no vigour in them.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: So they are;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: My spirits, as in a dream, are all bound up.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: My father's loss, the weakness which I feel,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: The wreck of all my friends, nor this man's threats,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: To whom I am subdued, are but light to me,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Might I but through my prison once a day

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Behold this maid: all corners else o' the earth

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Let liberty make use of; space enough

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: FERDINAND
line: Have I in such a prison.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Aside                It works.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Come on.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou hast done well, fine Ariel!

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Follow me.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Hark what thou else shalt do me.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Be of comfort;

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: My father's of a better nature, sir,

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Than he appears by speech: this is unwonted

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: MIRANDA
line: Which now came from him.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Thou shalt be free

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: As mountain winds: but then exactly do

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: All points of my command.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ARIEL
line: To the syllable.

scene: SCENE II.  The island. Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Come, follow. Speak not for him.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Beseech you, sir, be merry; you have cause,

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: So have we all, of joy; for our escape

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Is much beyond our loss. Our hint of woe

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Is common; every day some sailor's wife,

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: The masters of some merchant and the merchant

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Have just our theme of woe; but for the miracle,

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: I mean our preservation, few in millions

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Can speak like us: then wisely, good sir, weigh

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Our sorrow with our comfort.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ALONSO
line: Prithee, peace.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: He receives comfort like cold porridge.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: The visitor will not give him o'er so.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Look he's winding up the watch of his wit;

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: by and by it will strike.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Sir,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: One: tell.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: When every grief is entertain'd that's offer'd,

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Comes to the entertainer--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: A dollar.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Dolour comes to him, indeed: you

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: have spoken truer than you purposed.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: You have taken it wiselier than I meant you should.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Therefore, my lord,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Fie, what a spendthrift is he of his tongue!

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ALONSO
line: I prithee, spare.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Well, I have done: but yet,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: He will be talking.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Which, of he or Adrian, for a good

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: wager, first begins to crow?

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: The old cock.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: The cockerel.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Done. The wager?

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: A laughter.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: A match!

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: Though this island seem to be desert,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Ha, ha, ha! So, you're paid.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: Uninhabitable and almost inaccessible,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Yet,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: Yet,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: He could not miss't.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: It must needs be of subtle, tender and delicate

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: temperance.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Temperance was a delicate wench.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Ay, and a subtle; as he most learnedly delivered.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: The air breathes upon us here most sweetly.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: As if it had lungs and rotten ones.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Or as 'twere perfumed by a fen.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Here is everything advantageous to life.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: True; save means to live.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Of that there's none, or little.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: How lush and lusty the grass looks! how green!

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: The ground indeed is tawny.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: With an eye of green in't.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: He misses not much.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: No; he doth but mistake the truth totally.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: But the rarity of it is,--which is indeed almost

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: beyond credit,--

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: As many vouched rarities are.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: That our garments, being, as they were, drenched in

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: the sea, hold notwithstanding their freshness and

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: glosses, being rather new-dyed than stained with

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: salt water.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: If but one of his pockets could speak, would it not

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: say he lies?

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Ay, or very falsely pocket up his report

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Methinks our garments are now as fresh as when we

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: put them on first in Afric, at the marriage of

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: the king's fair daughter Claribel to the King of Tunis.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: 'Twas a sweet marriage, and we prosper well in our return.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: Tunis was never graced before with such a paragon to

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: their queen.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Not since widow Dido's time.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Widow! a pox o' that! How came that widow in?

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: widow Dido!

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: What if he had said 'widower AEneas' too? Good Lord,

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: how you take it!

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: 'Widow Dido' said you? you make me study of that:

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: she was of Carthage, not of Tunis.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: This Tunis, sir, was Carthage.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ADRIAN
line: Carthage?

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: I assure you, Carthage.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: His word is more than the miraculous harp; he hath

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: raised the wall and houses too.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: What impossible matter will he make easy next?

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: I think he will carry this island home in his pocket

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: and give it his son for an apple.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: And, sowing the kernels of it in the sea, bring

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: forth more islands.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Ay.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: Why, in good time.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Sir, we were talking that our garments seem now

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: as fresh as when we were at Tunis at the marriage

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: of your daughter, who is now queen.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: And the rarest that e'er came there.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Bate, I beseech you, widow Dido.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ANTONIO
line: O, widow Dido! ay, widow Dido.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: Is not, sir, my doublet as fresh as the first day I

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.
speaker: GONZALO
line: wore it? I mean, in a sort.

scene: SCENE I.  Another part of the island.

speaker: MIRANDA

speaker: MIRANDA

speaker: FERDINAND

line: Indeed the top of admiration! worth

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.

line: Tell not me; when the butt is out, we will drink

line: Drink, servant-monster, when I bid thee: thy eyes

line: are almost set in thy head.

speaker: TRINCULO
line: Where should they be set else? he were a brave

speaker: TRINCULO
line: monster indeed, if they were set in his tail.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: My man-monster hath drown'd his tongue in sack:

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: for my part, the sea cannot drown me; I swam, ere I

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: could recover the shore, five and thirty leagues off

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: and on. By this light, thou shalt be my lieutenant,

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: monster, or my standard.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: Your lieutenant, if you list; he's no standard.

speaker: STEPHANO
line: We'll not run, Monsieur Monster.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: Nor go neither; but you'll lie like dogs and yet say

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: nothing neither.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: Moon-calf, speak once in thy life, if thou beest a

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: good moon-calf.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: How does thy honour? Let me lick thy shoe.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: I'll not serve him; he's not valiant.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: Thou liest, most ignorant monster: I am in case to

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: justle a constable. Why, thou deboshed fish thou,

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: was there ever man a coward that hath drunk so much

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: sack as I to-day? Wilt thou tell a monstrous lie,

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: being but half a fish and half a monster?

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Lo, how he mocks me! wilt thou let him, my lord?

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: 'Lord' quoth he! That a monster should be such a natural!

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Lo, lo, again! bite him to death, I prithee.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: Trinculo, keep a good tongue in your head: if you

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: prove a mutineer,--the next tree! The poor monster's

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: my subject and he shall not suffer indignity.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: I thank my noble lord. Wilt thou be pleased to

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: hearken once again to the suit I made to thee?

speaker: STEPHANO
line: Marry, will I kneel and repeat it; I will stand,

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: and so shall Trinculo.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: As I told thee before, I am subject to a tyrant, a

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: sorcerer, that by his cunning hath cheated me of the island.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ARIEL
line: Thou liest.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Thou liest, thou jesting monkey, thou: I would my

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: valiant master would destroy thee! I do not lie.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: Trinculo, if you trouble him any more in's tale, by

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: this hand, I will supplant some of your teeth.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: Why, I said nothing.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: Mum, then, and no more. Proceed.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: I say, by sorcery he got this isle;

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: From me he got it. if thy greatness will

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Revenge it on him,--for I know thou darest,

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: But this thing dare not,--

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: That's most certain.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Thou shalt be lord of it and I'll serve thee.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: How now shall this be compassed?

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: Canst thou bring me to the party?

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Yea, yea, my lord: I'll yield him thee asleep,

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Where thou mayst knock a nail into his bead.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: ARIEL
line: Thou liest; thou canst not.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: What a pied ninny's this! Thou scurvy patch!

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: I do beseech thy greatness, give him blows

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: And take his bottle from him: when that's gone

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: He shall drink nought but brine; for I'll not show him

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Where the quick freshes are.

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: Trinculo, run into no further danger:

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: interrupt the monster one word further, and,

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: by this hand, I'll turn my mercy out o' doors

scene: SCENE II.  Another part of the island.
speaker: STEPHANO

line: And as with age his body uglier grows,

speaker: CALIBAN
line: Pray you, tread softly, that the blind mole may not

speaker: STEPHANO
line: Monster, your fairy, which you say is

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: Monster, I do smell all horse-piss; at

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: So is mine. Do you hear, monster? If I should take

speaker: CALIBAN
line: Good my lord, give me thy favour still.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Be patient, for the prize I'll bring thee to

speaker: CALIBAN
line: Shall hoodwink this mischance: therefore speak softly.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: All's hush'd as midnight yet.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: Ay, but to lose our bottles in the pool,--

speaker: STEPHANO
line: There is not only disgrace and dishonour in that,

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: monster, but an infinite loss.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: TRINCULO
line: That's more to me than my wetting: yet this is your

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: I will fetch off my bottle, though I be o'er ears

speaker: STEPHANO
line: for my labour.

speaker: CALIBAN
line: Prithee, my king, be quiet. Seest thou here,

speaker: STEPHANO
line: O, touch me not; I am not Stephano, but a cramp.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: You'ld be king o' the isle, sirrah?

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: STEPHANO
line: I should have been a sore one then.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ALONSO
line: This is a strange thing as e'er I look'd on.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: He is as disproportion'd in his manners

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: As in his shape. Go, sirrah, to my cell;

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Take with you your companions; as you look

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To have my pardon, trim it handsomely.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Ay, that I will; and I'll be wise hereafter

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: And seek for grace. What a thrice-double ass

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: Was I, to take this drunkard for a god

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: CALIBAN
line: And worship this dull fool!

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Go to; away!

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ALONSO
line: Hence, and bestow your luggage where you found it.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: SEBASTIAN
line: Or stole it, rather.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Sir, I invite your highness and your train

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: To my poor cell, where you shall take your rest

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: For this one night; which, part of it, I'll waste

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: With such discourse as, I not doubt, shall make it

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Go quick away; the story of my life

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And the particular accidents gone by

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Since I came to this isle: and in the morn

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: I'll bring you to your ship and so to Naples,

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Where I have hope to see the nuptial

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Of these our dear-beloved solemnized;

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And thence retire me to my Milan, where

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Every third thought shall be my grave.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ALONSO
line: I long

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ALONSO
line: To hear the story of your life, which must

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: ALONSO
line: Take the ear strangely.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: I'll deliver all;

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And promise you calm seas, auspicious gales

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: And sail so expeditious that shall catch

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Your royal fleet far off.

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: My Ariel, chick,

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: That is thy charge: then to the elements

scene: SCENE I.  Before PROSPERO'S cell.
speaker: PROSPERO
line: Be free, and fare thou well! Please you, draw near.
